summary:
The holiness of Pepe never stops, Pepe followers all over the space resurrected the Pepe meme. - Introducing Pepe God, as the God of all Pepe. Bring blessings to your own meme world, follow and you shall receive rewards.

 PEPE GOD MEME - Pepe God was born from the people's hunger to bring Pepe as a God of all Memes. Pepe God inspired by community's effort to bring excitement and unique adventure to the funny world of Meme. 2023 was the year of Pepe, he has proven enough and brought millions of followers and believers in the past few months. Now the time comes that these believers should seek Pepe God as their one and only God of Meme. Don't miss this chance to be part of the Pepe religion.

 tokenomics - No Taxes, No Bullshit. It’s that simple. LP tokens are burnt, and contract ownership is renounced. Token Supply: 1.000.000.000
